testsuite.name: Scenario Outline: TC009 user receives an alert for providing the value of max learners field lower than the the no of students added

testcase.name: Given User is on login screen
When User provides userRole 'org Admin1' to get username and Password as "Oxford@123"
And User logged into the application
And Click My School
And Close cookie banner
And Click on My class
And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And Select multiple teachers
And Click Next
And Select multiple Students
And Click add seat number toggle
And Decrease the seat number to a value less than no of students selected
And Verify message in add student panel "This number can not be less than the number of learners in your class"
And Click Next
And Check Add class button is not clickable
And Click close
And Verify Account widget icon is present
And Click on sign out
Then Verify that user is on sign out page
Then Close browser
Given User is on login screen
When User provides userRole 'Teacher1' to get username and Password as "Oxford@123"
And User logged into the application
And Click My School
And Close cookie banner
And Click on My class
And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And Select multiple teachers
And Click Next
And Select multiple Students
And Click add seat number toggle
And Decrease the seat number to a value less than no of students selected
And Verify message in add student panel "This number can not be less than the number of learners in your class"
And Click Next
And Check Add class button is not clickable
And Click close
And Verify Account widget icon is present
And Click on sign out
Then Verify that user is on sign out page
Then Close browser

testcase.name: And Close cookie banner
And Click on My class
And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And Select multiple teachers
And Click Next
And Select multiple Students
And Click add seat number toggle
And Decrease the seat number to a value less than no of students selected
And Verify message in add student panel "This number can not be less than the number of learners in your class"
And Click Next
And Check Add class button is not clickable
And Click close
And Verify Account widget icon is present
And Click on sign out
Then Verify that user is on sign out page
Then Close browser

testcase.name: And Close cookie banner
And Click on My class
And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And Verify teacher tab is there and we can select a teacher
And Verify teacherAdministrator tab is there and we can select a teacher
And Verify SchoolAdministrator tab is there and we can select a teacher Admin
And Click close
And Verify Account widget icon is present
And Click on sign out
Then Verify that user is on sign out page
Then Close browser

testcase.name: And Close cookie banner
And Click on My class
And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And Verify teacher tab is there and we can select a teacher
And Verify teacherAdministrator tab is there and we can select a teacher
And Verify SchoolAdministrator tab is there and we can select a teacher Admin
And Click close
And Verify Account widget icon is present
And Click on sign out
Then Verify that user is on sign out page
Then Close browser

testcase.name: And Click on OUP organisation
And Search the Institution and navigate to the same institution
And Click on My class

And Click on Add class
And Enter class name "Classc"
And Click Next
And ADD Teacher page and click Next
And Add Student page and click Next
Then User is in Review Page
Then User selects number of seat
Then click on Final Add class
Then See the successful message
Then click Done after message

And Click on sign out

Then Close browser
